history.proof: intros n m pr. unfold Representable. unfold evalProjFunc. unfold projFormula. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Representable: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
RepresentableAlternate: forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f B
RepresentableHelp: forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
Representable_ext: forall (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp NN n g A
succFormula: Formula
zeroFormula: Formula
projFormula: nat -> Formula

Goal:
forall (n m : nat) (pr : m < n), Representable n (evalProjFunc n m pr) (projFormula m)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNN : fol.System LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> Prop
extEqual : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> naryFunc n -> Prop
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
evalProjFunc : forall n m : nat, m < n -> naryFunc n
Formula = fol.Formula LNN : Set
NN = Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula LNN) (Ensembles.Singleton (fol.Formula LNN) NN1) NN2) NN3) NN4) NN5) NN6) NN7) NN8) NN9 : Ensembles.Ensemble (fol.Formula LNN)
iffH = fol.iffH LNN : fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN -> fol.Formula LNN
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [Representable := expressible.Representable NN : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop RepresentableAlternate := expressible.RepresentableAlternate NN closedNN1 : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) ->...-> Formula |- Type]
expressible.Representable_ext : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f g : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), extEqual n f g -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n g A
expressible.RepresentableAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f B
RepresentableHalfHelp : forall (T : System) (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (A : Formula), RepresentableHalf1 T n f A -> RepresentableHalf2 T n f A -> expressible.RepresentableHelp T n f A
reduceAddExists : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
reduceAddForalls : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (iffH A B) -> SysPrf NN (iffH (addForalls m n A) (addForalls m n B))
reduceAddExistsOneWay : forall (n m : nat) (A B : Formula), SysPrf NN (impH A B) -> SysPrf NN (impH (addExists m n A) (addExists m n B))
expressibleAlternate : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A B : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH A B) -> ExpressibleHelp T n R A -> ExpressibleHelp T n R B
evalStrongRecHelp2 : forall (a : nat) (f : naryFunc (S (S a))) (n m : nat), m < n -> extEqual a (evalComposeFunc a 1 (Vector.cons ((fix naryFunc (n0 : nat) : Set := match n0 with | 0 => nat | S n1 => nat -> naryFunc n1 end) a) (evalStrongRecHelp a f n) 0 (Vector.nil ((fix naryFunc (n0 : nat) : Set := match n0 with | 0 => nat | S n1 => nat -> naryFunc n1 end) a))) (fun b : nat => codeNth (n - S m) b)) (evalStrongRec a f m)
VectorDef.t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Type), P 0 (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
Representable2Expressible : forall T : System, ClosedSystem LNN T -> SysPrf T (notH (equal (natToTerm 1) (natToTerm 0))) -> forall (n : nat) (R : naryRel n) (A : Formula), expressible.Representable T n (charFunction n R) A -> Expressible T n R (substituteFormula LNN A 0 (natToTerm 1))
evalStrongRecHelp1 : forall (f : naryFunc 2) (n m : nat), m < n -> codeNth (n - S m) (evalStrongRecHelp 0 f n) = evalStrongRec 0 f m
expressible.RepresentableHelp : System -> forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Formula -> Prop
extEqualCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (f1 f2 : naryFunc n), extEqual n f1 f2 -> forall g1 g2 : naryFunc (S n), extEqual (S n) g1 g2 -> extEqual n (compose2 n f1 g1) (compose2 n f2 g2)
extEqualCompose : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (f1 f2 : naryFunc m), extEqualVector n m l1 l2 -> extEqual m f1 f2 -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n m l1 f1) (evalComposeFunc n m l2 f2)
boundedLT : forall (m : nat) (a : Formula) (x : nat), (forall n : nat, n < m -> SysPrf NN (substituteFormula LNN a x (natToTerm n))) -> SysPrf NN (impH (LT (var x) (natToTerm m)) a)
projectionListId : forall (n : nat) (f : naryFunc n) (p : n <= n), extEqual n f (evalComposeFunc n n (projectionList n n p) f)
FormulasToFormula : forall n : nat, nat -> forall m : nat, Vector.t (Formula * naryFunc n) m -> Formula
extEqualTrans : forall (n : nat) (a b c : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b c -> extEqual n a c
replaceCompose2 : forall (n : nat) (a b a' b' : naryFunc n) (c c' : naryFunc 2), extEqual n a a' -> extEqual n b b' -> extEqual 2 c c' -> extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c) (evalComposeFunc n 2 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) a' 1 (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) b' 0 (Vector.nil (naryFunc n)))) c')
extEqualSym : forall (n : nat) (a b : naryFunc n), extEqual n a b -> extEqual n b a
subAllCloseFrom : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (f : fol.Formula L) (T : fol.System L), folProof.SysPrf L T (closeFrom L 0 n f) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (subAllFormula L f (fun x : nat => if le_lt_dec n x then fol.var L x else m x))
iffTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g h) -> SysPrf T (iffH f h)
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
iffI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T (iffH f g)
addExists = fix addExists (m n : nat) (f : Formula) {struct n} : Formula := match n with | 0 => f | S n' => existH (n' + m) (addExists m n' f) end : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments addExists (_ _)%nat_scope
addForalls = fix addForalls (m n : nat) (f : Formula) {struct n} : Formula := match n with | 0 => f | S n' => forallH (n' + m) (addForalls m n' f) end : nat -> nat -> Formula -> Formula Arguments addForalls (_ _)%nat_scope
evalPrimRecParam : forall (n c d : nat) (g : naryFunc (S n)) (h : naryFunc (S (S (S n)))), extEqual n (evalPrimRecFunc n (g d) (fun x y : nat => h x y d) c) (evalPrimRecFunc (S n) g h c d)
reduce2ndCompose : forall (c n m : nat) (v : Vector.t (naryFunc n) m) (n0 : naryFunc n) (g : naryFunc (S (S m))), extEqual n (evalComposeFunc n (S (S m)) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) n0 (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) (evalConstFunc n c) m v)) g) (evalComposeFunc n (S m) (Vector.cons (naryFunc n) n0 m v) (fun x : nat => g x c))
iffSym : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (iffH g f)
iffE2 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g f)
iffE1 : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (iffH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f g)
andI : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T (andH f g)
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
impE : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T (impH g f) -> SysPrf T g -> SysPrf T f
impTrans : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (impH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T (impH f h)
contradiction : forall (T : System) (f g : Formula), SysPrf T f -> SysPrf T (notH f) -> SysPrf T g
evalComposeFunc : forall n m : nat, Vector.t (naryFunc n) m -> naryFunc m -> naryFunc n
extEqualOneParamList : forall (n m : nat) (l1 l2 : Vector.t (naryFunc (S n)) m) (c : nat), extEqualVector (S n) m l1 l2 -> extEqualVector n m (evalOneParamList n m c l1) (evalOneParamList n m c l2)
evalStrongRecHelpParam : forall (a n c : nat) (f : naryFunc (S (S (S a)))), extEqual a (evalStrongRecHelp (S a) f n c) (evalStrongRecHelp a (fun x y : nat => f x y c) n)

```  
intros n m pr.
unfold Representable.
unfold evalProjFunc.
unfold projFormula.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros n m pr. unfold Representable. unfold evalProjFunc. unfold projFormula. reflexivity.
